name: Symantec LiveUpdate File
summary: Learn about .LIVEUPDATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Common LIVEUPDATE files include Settings.LiveUpdate, Log.LiveUpdate, and Product.Inventory.LiveUpdate.

description: File used by LiveUpdate, a program used to update Symantec antivirus programs; contains data for updating antivirus software and virus definitions; facilitates remote software updates by providing local computer and software information.
